item.description:
SOLD OUT

 

The Contemporary Theater Company's performance of Red Herring was one of the funniest plays I've seen in years.  They are a young but very energetic troupe and put on a quality performance.  This Meetup will take in their production of Christopher Durang's "Mrs. Bob Cratchit’s Wild Christmas Binge", being performed at The Towers in Narragansett. 

Seating is general admission and is an absolute steal at $22.  If Red Herring is any example, this play will be non-stop laughter. Here is the description of the play:

Mrs. Bob Cratchit's Wild Christmas Binge is a humorous look at the oft-told Dickens Christmas classic about Ebeneezer Scrooge and his discovering the true meaning of Christmas. In this play, the Ghosts fumble with their magic, and Scrooge and the Ghosts keep appearing at Bob Cratchit's house at the most inopportune times. And it doesn't help that Mrs. Bob Cratchit is bubbling with anger, hating her life and planning to jump off the London Bridge.

Ticket Information

Tickets are $22. Seating is General Admission.

Each person is responsible for purchasing their own ticket. For reservations, please contact the theater. Their box office information is here: http://www.thecontemporarytheater.com/theat....

Please do not wait to order your tickets! I strongly recommend that you order your tickets now.

Meet-up Logistics

I will provide my cell number when you RSVP.  Meet at The Towers by 6:30.  Note that, since the seating is general admission, we will enter the theater as soon as the doors open.  If you are running late, please contact me so we can hold a seat for you.

Directions (per the CTC website)

The Towers is located at 35 Ocean Road in Narragansett, Rhode Island. The building is handicapped accessible. Free parking is widely available along Ocean Road.

Directions from points south

  1. Take R.I. Route 1 North.
  2. Take the Exit labeled Narragansett.
  3. At the end of the ramp, take right onto Woodruff Avenue.
  4. Continue straight through a traffic light. Woodruff Avenue becomes South Pier Road.
  5. Continue straight on South Pier Road until the end (1.4 miles). (Do note that after a mile you will reach a not-perfectly aligned four-way intersection. Continue straight.)
  6. Take a left on to Ocean Road. The Towers will be a half-mile ahead, spanning the roadway.

Directions from points north

  1. Take Interstate 95 South
  2. Exit to Route 4 (left-hand exit)
  3. Follow Route 4 for 9.9 miles.
  4. Route 4 becomes Route 1 (Tower Hill Road)
  5. Follow Route 1 for about 7.5 miles.
  6. Take the Narragansett Exit.
  7. At the end of the ramp, take a left onto R.I. Route 1A
  8. Enter a rotary and take first exit onto Route 108
  9. Take a left at the traffic light on to South Pier Road
  10. Continue straight on South Pier Road until the end (1.4 miles). (Do note that after a mile you will reach a not-perfectly aligned four-way intersection. Continue straight.)
  11. Take a left on to Ocean Road. The Towers will be a half-mile ahead, spanning the roadway.


View Larger Map
item.how_to_find_us: At the entrance to the theater
